com.client.GUI

Class Controls

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.client.GUI.Controls

  • public class Controls
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls for the game (i.e., what does what).
    Author:
    Ian

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int EXIT
      Control to open the close game dialog.
      static int HOLD_ATTACK
      Control that, when held down, causes the player to move to attack.
      static int HOLD_CAST
      Control that, when held down, causes the player to move to cast.
      static int OC_INVENTORY
      Control to open/close the inventory.
      static int OC_MERCHANT
      Control to open/close the merchant pane.
      static int OC_MESSAGES
      Control to open/close the message pane.
      static int OC_QUESTS
      Control to open/close the quests pane.
      static int OC_STATS
      Control to open/close the statistics pane.
      static int SELECT_SPELL_DOWN
      Control that selects spells downwards.
      static int SELECT_SPELL_UP
      Control that selects spells upwards.
      static int SERVER_STEP
      Control that, when in admin mode, steps the server.
